"Staple a note to your memory" - Use a stapler to attach a note to your memory, which can be easily referenced later.
"Staple your dreams to reality" - Use a stapler to attach a note to your dream board, which can help you visualize and achieve your goals.
"Staple your future to success" - Use a stapler to attach a note to your vision board, which can help you visualize and achieve your future successes.
"Staple your ideas to paper" - Use a stapler to attach your ideas to paper, which can help you organize and prioritize your thoughts.
"Staple your inspiration to your desk" - Use a stapler to attach your inspiration to your desk, which can help you stay motivated and focused on your work.
